1.title: Bathing Your Dog

episode of.title: PawdCasts: Pilar and the World of Dogs (TV Series 2013– )

1.plot: Host Pilar Kuhn demonstrates and explains one way to bathe a smaller dog - a Scottish Terrier - that has a longer coat than some dogs and shows a few bathing techniques folks can try at home.

3.title: Cool Your Dog

episode of.title: PawdCasts: Pilar and the World of Dogs (TV Series 2013– )

3.plot: Host Pilar Kuhn shares some tools and techniques to help keep your dog cool during warm weather and describes some signs to look for in case your dog may be suffering from a heat stroke.

10.title: Cost of Owning a Dog

episode of.title: PawdCasts: Pilar and the World of Dogs (TV Series 2013– )

10.plot: Host Pilar Kuhn breaks down the annual and lifetime costs of owning a dog. It's not just the initial adoption price you need to plan for, you have to think about the cost of food, treats, toys, medical expenses, grooming and boarding.

11.title: Trimming Your Dog's Nails

episode of.title: PawdCasts: Pilar and the World of Dogs (TV Series 2013– )

11.plot: Host Pilar Kuhn shows different ways to trim a dog's nails in this episode. With the help of Garrison the Bouvier and Miss Teal, a 7 week old Bouvier puppy, Pilar displays how to use guillotine nail clippers, a nail grinder and ordinary every day household toenail clippers to shorten the length of a dog's toenails and keep the toenails healthy without causing the dog any harm.

12.title: Microchipping Your Dog

episode of.title: PawdCasts: Pilar and the World of Dogs (TV Series 2013– )

12.plot: Host Pilar Kuhn and Guest Rod Ott discuss the reasons they microchip their dogs and then demonstrate how to insert a microchip. Now, if their dog is lost or stolen there is a better chance she'll be returned to them because the microchip is registered with the American Kennel Club (AKC) and linked to them. Featuring Chicory the Scottish Terrier.

13.title: Matted Dog Hair Removal

episode of.title: PawdCasts: Pilar and the World of Dogs (TV Series 2013– )

13.plot: Host Pilar Kuhn and her Bouvier Garrison demonstrate to viewers how any long-coated dog owner or groomer can work on removing mats more easily and without causing much canine discomfort by using a few key tools and techniques.

14.title: Red Barn

episode of.title: PawdCasts: Pilar and the World of Dogs (TV Series 2013– )

14.plot: Host Pilar Kuhn visits with Red Barn Guy, Gary Allison, to tell us about different dog food and dog treat options from Red Barn and why it's important to know what you are giving your dog to chew on and ingest. If you're in Southern California or neighboring states, Gary can get you just about any Red Barn product you desire!

15.title: Puppy Supplementation

episode of.title: PawdCasts: Pilar and the World of Dogs (TV Series 2013– )

15.plot: Host Pilar Kuhn shares with viewers a unique way to supplement very young nursing puppies without using a bottle or tube feeding. She and her husband Rod Ott decided to try this method after a video from YouTube made the rounds and here she shares their experiences with their puppies born this past summer. The puppy in the video is 12 days old at the time.

16.title: Whelping Boxes

episode of.title: PawdCasts: Pilar and the World of Dogs (TV Series 2013– )

16.plot: Host Pilar Kuhn shares with us two different sizes and designs of whelping boxes and explains the functionality of both. She also shares other supplies and tools to consider using when taking care of newborn puppies.

17.title: How Dog Shows Work

episode of.title: PawdCasts: Pilar and the World of Dogs (TV Series 2013– )

17.plot: Host Pilar Kuhn walks viewers through a typical day at a dog show, why it's done and how it works.

18.title: Breeds: Scotties and Bouviers Part 1

episode of.title: PawdCasts: Pilar and the World of Dogs (TV Series 2013– )

18.plot: Host, Pilar Kuhn, and her husband, Rod Ott, share how they came to show and breed Bouviers and Scotties. They talk about the unique personalities of the two breeds and why they get along so well. Featuring Chicory the Scottie and Garrison the Bouvier.

19.title: Breeds: Scotties and Bouviers Part 2

episode of.title: PawdCasts: Pilar and the World of Dogs (TV Series 2013– )

19.plot: Host, Pilar Kuhn, and her husband, Rod Ott, share more about how they came to show and breed Bouviers and Scotties in this "Part 2". They talk about the unique personalities of the two breeds and why they get along so well. Featuring Chicory the Scottie and Garrison the Bouvier.

20.title: Breed: Parson Russell Terrier

episode of.title: PawdCasts: Pilar and the World of Dogs (TV Series 2013– )

20.plot: Host Pilar talks with Danielle Warner of Windy Ridge Parsons about her Parson Russell Terrier named Trevor.

21.title: Breed: English Springer Spaniel

episode of.title: PawdCasts: Pilar and the World of Dogs (TV Series 2013– )

21.plot: Host Pilar Kuhn talks with Carrie Racey of Caran English Springer Spaniels about the qualities and attributes she has loved about the breed for the last 29 years.

22.title: Keeping Good Dog Records

episode of.title: PawdCasts: Pilar and the World of Dogs (TV Series 2013– )

22.plot: Host Pilar Kuhn discusses health records and good record keeping practices by responsible breeders and shelters to help all pet owners keep track or their dogs' health.
